sentence.Network_en: Bindweed ran up the stems of the corn.
sentence.Network_cn: 旋花缠绕着玉米杆往上长.

sentence.Network_en: The flexible twining or climbing stem of certain plants, such as the hop, woodbine, or bindweed.
sentence.Network_cn: 细长柔韧的枝或嫩条(尤指柳或一些藤茎植物), 用于枝编工艺.

entry.def: Bindweed is a wild plant that winds itself around other plants and makes it difficult for them to grow.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several vines of the genera Convolvulus and Calystegia having a twining habit
